subject: Plus X pedals
description_text:
Hi again, regarding the pedals: I was wondering if you have addressed the quality concerns in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QbJU6qsYM9I

14:56 - loose collar which leads to lateral pedal play
15:18 - misaligned load cell

Best regards,
Trygve

conversations.body_text: Hi，Trygve Thom，     Hello, we have made improvements to the center spacer based on user feedback, adding additional washers to eliminate the assembly gap.  As for the sensor offset, it is caused by installation tolerances. We have instructed the production team to make improvements and have designed a dedicated jig to assist in correcting alignment during assembly.
